name: Buffalo Wings
description: Tender chicken wings coated in your choice of tangy barbecue, spicy buffalo, or honey mustard glaze. Served with celery sticks and ranch dressing.

name: Grilled Quesadillas
description: Flour tortillas filled with melted cheese, grilled veggies, and your choice of seasoned chicken, steak, or shrimp. Served with salsa and sour cream.

name: Loaded Potato Skins
description: Crispy potato skins stuffed with cheddar cheese, crispy bacon, and scallions. Served with sour cream for dipping.

name: Grilled Veggie Platter
description: A plate of assorted vegetables grilled thoroughly with light seasoning.

name: Fried Calamari
description: Fried squid.

name: Signature Gameday Burger
description: A hearty 1/2-pound beef patty piled high with all your game day favorites. This masterpiece features crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, jalape√±os, and a drizzle of spicy homemade sauce.

name: The Classic Burger
description: A juicy 1/2-pound beef patty grilled to perfection, served with lettuce, tomato, onion, and your choice of cheese. Add bacon or avocado for extra flavor.

name: Grilled Chicken Club
description: Grilled chicken breast topped with bacon, Swiss cheese, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on a toasted bun.

name: Veggie Burger
description: A delicious plant-based patty grilled and served with lettuce, tomato, onion, and your choice of cheese.

name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwich
description: Slow-cooked pulled pork tossed in tangy barbecue sauce, topped with coleslaw, and served on a toasted brioche bun.

name: Molten Lava Cake
description: A warm chocolate cake with a gooey, molten center, served with vanilla ice cream and drizzled with chocolate sauce.

name: Cheesecake of the Day
description: Ask your server for today's featured cheesecake flavor.

name: Key Lime Pie
description: A tangy and creamy key lime pie in a graham cracker crust, topped with whipped cream and lime zest.

name: Chocolate Mousse
description: Tasty chocolate mousse topped with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

name: Peach Cobbler
description: Sweet, juicy peaches and topped with a golden, flaky crust, sprinkled with cinnamon.

name: Fruit Platter
description: An assortment of fresh berries, melon, pineapple, and grapes

name: New York Strip Steak
description: A succulent 12-ounce USDA Choice strip steak cooked to your liking and served with your choice of side.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh Atlantic salmon fillet seasoned and grilled to perfection, drizzled with lemon herb butter, and served with your choice of side.

name: Barbecue Ribs
description: St. Louis-style ribs slow-smoked and basted with our signature barbecue sauce. Served with coleslaw and cornbread.

name: Grilled Shrimp Skewers
description: Jumbo shrimp skewers marinated in garlic and herbs, grilled to perfection, and served with rice pilaf and grilled vegetables.

name: Lobster Tail
description: Sizzling, succulent lobster meat grilled to perfection, seasoned lightly with a garlic and lemon drizzle.

name: Classic Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese tossed in creamy Caesar dressing.

name: Southwest Steak Salad
description: Sliced grilled steak on a bed of mixed greens, topped with black beans, corn, avocado, and a zesty chipotle ranch dressing.

name: Chicken Salad
description: Shredded chicken, garden lettuce, cranberries, and accompanied by a variety of dressing flavors.

name: Garlic Parmesan Fries
description: Crispy fries tossed in garlic and Parmesan cheese.

name: Loaded Baked Potato
description: A baked potato topped with butter, sour cream, cheddar cheese, and bacon bits.

name: French Fries
description: Crispy, fried, and salted fries served warm with your meal.

name: Tomato Soup
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese tossed in creamy Caesar dressing.

name: Southwest Steak Salad
description: Sliced grilled steak on a bed of mixed greens, topped with black beans, corn, avocado, and a zesty chipotle ranch dressing.

name: Chicken Salad
description: Shredded chicken, garden lettuce, cranberries, and accompanied by a variety of dressing flavors.
